text:
A Moment of Confusion

Raskolnikov stands in a dimly lit passage.  
His heart races with turmoil.  
Raskolnikov: “I may bring something valuable soon…”  

Alyona Ivanovna eyes him suspiciously.  
Alyona: “What business is she of yours?”  
Raskolnikov: “Just curious… Good day!”  

---
Raskolnikov stumbles down the stairs, lost in thought.  
His mind spirals into chaos.  
Raskolnikov: “Oh, God, how loathsome…”  

He cries out to the empty street.  
Raskolnikov: “What filthy things my heart can think!”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Raskolnikov experiences intense confusion and repulsion after visiting Alyona Ivanovna, reflecting on the disturbing thoughts that have plagued him.
